targets.query: SELECT count("url") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" = '500' ) OR  ("status" = '404' ) OR  ("status" = '400' ) OR ("status" = '200')  OR ("status" = '201')    AND time >= now() - 6h and time <= now() GROUP BY  "status"
SELECT count("url") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" = '404') AND time >= now() - 6h and time <= now() GROUP BY "name", "status"
SELECT count("url") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" = '500') AND time >= now() - 6h and time <= now() GROUP BY "name", "status"
SELECT count("value"), sum("value") as "Success Count",min("value"), median("value"), max("value"), mean("value"), percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "group"
